text: <speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_charges.Airtime.usageSummaryChargeAmt</prosody> for airtime usage on your invoice.</speak>
<speak>I see a total of<prosody rate=”slow”> $$session.params.usage_charges.Airtime.usageSummaryChargeAmt</prosody> for airtime usage on your bill.</speak>

<speak>Vous avez des frais de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.usage_charges.Airtime.usageSummaryChargeAmt $</prosody> pour l'utilisation du temps d'antenne sur votre facture du $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.bill_summary.billSummary.billDt, "dd MMMM yyyy", "fr-ca").</speak>
<speak>Je vois un total de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.usage_charges.Airtime.usageSummaryChargeAmt $</prosody> pour l'utilisation du temps d'antenne sur votre facture.</speak>
<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_summary_charges.LocalAirtimePhoneminutes.totalChargeAmt</prosody> for local airtime usage on your invoice.</speak>
<speak>I see a total of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_summary_charges.LocalAirtimePhoneminutes.totalChargeAmt</prosody> for data overedges on your bill.</speak>

<speak>Vous avez des frais de <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.usage_summary_charges.LocalAirtimePhoneminutes.totalChargeAmt $</prosody> pour l'utilisation de temps d'antenne local sur votre facture.</speak>
<speak>Je vois un total de <prosody rate=”slow”> $session.params.usage_summary_charges.LocalAirtimePhoneminutes.totalChargeAmt $</prosody> pour l'utilisation de données sur votre facture.</speak>
I can't see charges for airtime overedges on your invoice.
Je ne vois pas de frais de dépassement du temps d'antenne sur votre facture.
